title: FS: Postcards of Hornsby, Cuyler, NY Giants (w/Mathewson), Cy Young
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: Postcards of Hornsby, Cuyler, NY Giants (w/Mathewson), Cy Young
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
Fielding offers on these beauties, I'll let these postcards out of my personal collection if a deal is struck! Here are the four that are available...

• 1912 N.Y. Giants Team Composite Postcard (w/ Mathewson and McGraw) SOLD
• 1926 The Spirit of the Times Rogers Hornsby RPPC. One of the coolest postcards I've ever seen or owned! SOLD
• 1931 PV Reyes Kiki Cuyler RPPC. Crisp photo on this one!
• C. 1930's Real Photo Postcard of Cy Young (left) with his friend Jay Abbott. Heavy creasing but great photo! SOLD

Shoot me an offer if interested!
Jeff
Thanks Derek! As requested here's a scan of the back of the 1912 N.Y. Giants Team Composite Postcard...
Also as requested here's a scan of the back of the 1926 The Spirit of the Times Rogers Hornsby RPPC. VERY COOL "The Spirit of the Times" Stamp on the reverse!
Hornsby is sold, thanks for the interest everyone!

Only the sweet Cuyler postcard is left, first $500 takes it. Great price if you want to add what I believe to be the nicest Kiki Cuyler postcard to you're collection! Thanks guys!
Jeff
